com.lambdaworks.redis.pubsub

Interface RedisPubSubConnection<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - Key type.
    V - Value type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, BaseRedisAsyncCommands<K,V>, BaseRedisAsyncConnection<K,V>, Closeable, RedisAsyncConnection<K,V>, RedisClusterAsyncConnection<K,V>, RedisGeoAsyncConnection<K,V>, RedisHashesAsyncConnection<K,V>, RedisHLLAsyncConnection<K,V>, RedisKeysAsyncConnection<K,V>, RedisListsAsyncConnection<K,V>, RedisScriptingAsyncConnection<K,V>, RedisServerAsyncConnection<K,V>, RedisSetsAsyncConnection<K,V>, RedisSortedSetsAsyncConnection<K,V>, RedisStringsAsyncConnection<K,V>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RedisPubSubAsyncCommands<K,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RedisPubSubAsyncCommandsImpl
    Deprecated. 
    Use RedisPubSubAsyncCommands

    @Deprecated
public interface RedisPubSubConnection<K,V>
extends RedisAsyncConnection<K,V>
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Mark Paluch
